caption.center: DIANE N. GIACOMINI v. DR. JOSEPH BEVILACQUA et al.

opinion.posture: The defendants' motion to file a post argument memorandum is granted.
opinion.attorneys:
Oster, Espo, Fay Groff, Irving N. Espo, George M.Prescott, for plaintiff.
Julius C. Michaelson, Attorney General, Richard B.Woolley, Special Asst. Attorney General, for defendants.
